Action.author: angelo.decaro
Action.body: What do you mean? Fixed the hash family, the HMAC algorithm is then well defined.

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: ~adc , let me try to understand : You are saying that , HMAC function should correspond the BCCSP hash family ?

Action.body: I mark this as DONE after the discussion we had a couple of weeks ago.
